About.meta_title: About Rolitt | Our Story and Mission
About.meta_description: Learn more about Rolitt, our mission, vision, and the team behind our innovative AI companion.
About.title: About Rolitt
About.subtitle: We create AI companions that build emotional connections and enrich lives
About.mission_description: Our mission is simple yet ambitious: to bridge the gap between technology and the human spirit. At Rolitt, we believe technology should feel personal and meaningful. We're building smart companions—whether through our interactive robots or wearable devices like our smart ring—that enrich people's lives in deeply personal ways, bringing a sense of companionship, empowerment, and delight to every moment.
About.story_description: Rolitt was born from a desire to create something more than just functional technology. As a team of engineers, designers, and dreamers, we wanted to go beyond the typical boundaries of tech and design something that truly connects with people. It all started with our companion robot, crafted to offer warmth, understanding, and a friendly presence in people's daily lives.
About.approach_description: At Rolitt, our approach is simple: make technology that resonates with people. Every product we design starts with a question: How can we make this feel more human? From intelligent wearables that support your daily rhythm to AI-powered devices that engage with genuine warmth, we're dedicated to building smart hardware that brings joy, ease, and meaning to the everyday.
About.approach_description2: We believe that technology shouldn't be just a tool—it should be a companion. By focusing on thoughtful design, advanced AI, and intuitive interactions, we're creating a new category of devices that bridge the gap between utility and humanity. Rolitt isn't just about innovation; it's about creating experiences that you can rely on, connect with, and take with you wherever life leads.
About.value1_description: We strive to push the boundaries of what AI can accomplish by continuously exploring and implementing new technologies.
About.value2_description: We design our AI companions with a deep understanding of human emotions and needs to provide genuine emotional support.
About.value3_description: We are committed to making our technology accessible and usable for people of all ages and abilities.
About.team_description: Our diverse team brings together experts in artificial intelligence, robotics, psychology, and design to create AI companions that are both technologically advanced and humanly engaging.
About.member1_bio: As founder and CEO, Anna brings over 15 years of experience in AI and robotics. Her vision of emotional AI drives Rolitt forward.
About.member2_bio: As CTO, Michael leads the technical development of Rolitt, ensuring our AI systems are both innovative and reliable.
About.member3_bio: As Head of Research, Sofia combines her expertise in psychology and AI to enhance the emotional intelligence of Rolitt.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach. Garnered favorable responses from event attendees, resulting in a successful event with heightened participant engagement and increased brand visibility.

FAQ.meta_description: Find answers to common questions about our robotics solutions, technology, and services.
FAQ.meta_keywords: robotics FAQ, technology questions, Rolitt support, robotics help
FAQ.meta_og_description: Get answers to common questions about our robotics solutions and services. Find the information you need quickly and easily.
FAQ.meta_twitter_description: Get answers to common questions about our robotics solutions and services. Find the information you need quickly and easily.
FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Find Answers
FAQ.question_1: What types of robotics solutions does Rolitt offer?
FAQ.answer_1: Rolitt offers a wide range of robotics solutions including industrial automation systems, healthcare assistance robots, educational robotics platforms, and home automation solutions. Each product line is designed to address specific needs in different sectors while leveraging our core AI and robotics technologies.
FAQ.question_2: How can I integrate Rolitt's technology with my existing systems?
FAQ.answer_2: Our solutions are designed with interoperability in mind. We provide comprehensive APIs, documentation, and integration support to ensure seamless connection with your existing infrastructure. Our technical team works closely with clients during implementation to ensure successful integration and minimal disruption.
FAQ.question_3: What kind of support does Rolitt provide after purchase?
FAQ.answer_3: We offer comprehensive post-purchase support including technical assistance, maintenance services, software updates, and training programs. Our support packages can be tailored to your specific needs, from basic troubleshooting to full-service maintenance contracts with guaranteed response times.
FAQ.question_4: Is Rolitt's technology suitable for small businesses?
FAQ.answer_4: Absolutely! We have solutions designed for organizations of all sizes. For small businesses, we offer scalable options that provide advanced capabilities without requiring extensive infrastructure or technical expertise. Our modular approach allows you to start small and expand as your needs grow.
FAQ.question_5: How does Rolitt ensure the security of its robotic systems?
FAQ.answer_5: Security is a top priority at Rolitt. We implement multiple layers of protection including encrypted communications, secure authentication protocols, regular security updates, and comprehensive vulnerability testing. Our systems are designed with privacy-by-design principles and comply with relevant industry standards and regulations.
FAQ.question_6: What makes Rolitt's technology different from competitors?
FAQ.answer_6: Our key differentiator is our proprietary AI technology that enables more adaptive, intelligent behavior in our robotic systems. Additionally, we focus on user-friendly interfaces, seamless integration capabilities, and robust security features. Our solutions are developed with extensive real-world testing to ensure reliability and performance in diverse environments.
FAQ.still_have_questions: Still have questions? We're here to help!
FAQ.contact_us_text: Contact our support team for personalized assistance with your specific needs.

Timeline.meta_title: Our Company Timeline | Key Milestones and Events
Timeline.meta_description: Explore the journey of our company through key milestones and events that have shaped our history and vision for the future.
Timeline.title: Our Journey
Timeline.description: Discover the key moments that have defined our path and shaped our vision for the future.

event1.title: The Beginning of an Idea
event1.description: Founder AVIVA bought a talking toy for his 4-year-old daughter. While it looked cute, he felt it was just a plastic toy. Inspired by his experience in the internet industry, AVIVA decided to create an AI-powered robotic toy.

event2.title: Forming the Core Team
event2.description: AVIVA recognized the challenges of creating such an innovative product. He interviewed many industry experts and assembled a passionate team. They began developing the Rolitt product in a borrowed office space.

event3.title: Countless Iterations
event3.description: The team tackled embedded development, AI SaaS development, APP,model fine-tuning, structural design, industrial design, website design, PCB design and soldering, hardware debugging, and more. Despite the difficulties, our perseverance led to at least five product iterations.

event4.title: Refining the Prototype
event4.description: Starting is tough, but the Rolitt team stayed committed. By late August, we refined our prototype, marking a significant milestone.

event5.title: Introducing Rolitt to the World
event5.description: With the prototype ready, we're excited to introduce Rolitt. We're committed to ongoing improvements and iterations as we move forward.

Solution.meta_description: Discover our innovative robotic solutions designed to transform various industries and enhance everyday life.
Solution.title: Our Robotic Solutions
Solution.subtitle: Innovative technologies designed to transform industries and enhance everyday life
Solution.solution1_description: Our industrial robots streamline manufacturing processes, increasing efficiency and reducing costs. With advanced sensors and AI capabilities, they adapt to changing production needs in real-time.
Solution.solution2_description: Designed to support healthcare professionals, our medical robots assist in surgeries, patient care, and rehabilitation. They provide precision and consistency in critical procedures.
Solution.solution3_description: Our educational robots make learning STEM subjects engaging and interactive. They help students develop critical thinking, problem-solving skills, and technological literacy.
Solution.solution4_description: Smart home robots that simplify daily tasks, enhance security, and improve energy efficiency. They integrate seamlessly with existing smart home systems for a connected living experience.

Partner.meta_description: Explore strategic partnership opportunities with Rolitt and join us in shaping the future of AI companionship and robotics.
Partner.title: Partner With Rolitt
Partner.subtitle: Join us on our mission to revolutionize AI companionship and create meaningful connections through innovative technology
Partner.vision_description: At Rolitt, we believe that groundbreaking innovation happens through collaboration. We're seeking forward-thinking partners who share our passion for creating technology that enhances human connection and brings joy to everyday life.
Partner.vision_description2: Whether you're an investor looking for the next big opportunity, a technology provider interested in integration, or a distributor wanting to bring Rolitt to new markets, we're excited to explore how we can create value together.
Partner.partner1_description: Leading technology innovator specializing in AI and machine learning solutions.
Partner.partner2_description: Educational institution focused on bringing technology to classrooms worldwide.
Partner.partner3_description: Healthcare technology provider improving patient care through innovative solutions.
Partner.partner4_description: Home automation experts creating intelligent living spaces for modern families.
Partner.partnership_types_description: We offer various ways to collaborate with Rolitt, each designed to create mutual value and drive innovation in the AI companionship space.
Partner.partnership_type1_description: Join us as an investor and be part of the future of AI companionship. We offer attractive investment opportunities with significant growth potential in a rapidly expanding market.
Partner.partnership_type2_description: Partner with us to develop tailored AI companion solutions for your specific industry or use case. Our flexible technology can be adapted to meet unique requirements.
Partner.partnership_type3_description: Become a distributor or retailer of Rolitt products. We're looking for partners to help us expand our reach and bring our AI companions to new markets worldwide.
Partner.partnership_type4_description: Integrate your technology with Rolitt or incorporate our AI capabilities into your products. We're open to collaborative innovation that enhances both our offerings.
Partner.benefit1: Access to cutting-edge AI and robotics technology with proven market appeal
Partner.benefit2: Opportunity to enter the rapidly growing AI companion market projected to reach $20B by 2028
Partner.benefit3: Flexible partnership models tailored to your business objectives and capabilities
Partner.benefit4: Dedicated partnership support team to ensure successful collaboration
Partner.benefit5: Co-marketing opportunities and shared brand visibility
Partner.benefit6: Early access to new product developments and technology innovations
Partner.testimonial_quote: Partnering with Rolitt has been transformative for our business. Their innovative approach to AI companionship and commitment to quality has helped us deliver exceptional value to our customers. The team is responsive, creative, and truly collaborative.
Partner.become_partner_description: We're excited to discuss how we can create value together. Contact us today to start the conversation about partnership possibilities with Rolitt.

Terms.meta_description: Read our terms of service to understand the rules and guidelines for using Rolitt's products and services.
Terms.title: Terms of Service
Terms.section1_content: By accessing or using Rolitt's services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service and all applicable laws and regulations. If you do not agree with any of these terms, you are prohibited from using or accessing our services.
Terms.section2_content: Permission is granted to temporarily use Rolitt's services for personal, non-commercial purposes. This license does not include: modifying or copying materials; using materials for commercial purposes; attempting to decompile or reverse engineer any software; removing any copyright or proprietary notations; or transferring materials to another person or 'mirroring' materials on any other server.
Terms.section3_content: Rolitt's services are provided on an 'as is' basis. We make no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaim all warranties, including without limitation implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose.
Terms.section4_content: In no event shall Rolitt or its suppliers be liable for any damages (including, without limitation, damages for loss of data or profit, or due to business interruption) arising out of the use or inability to use our services.
Terms.section5_content: The materials appearing on Rolitt's services could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. We do not warrant that any of the materials are accurate, complete or current. We may make changes to the materials at any time without notice.

Privacy.meta_description: Learn how Rolitt collects, uses, and protects your personal information through our privacy policy.
Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.section1_content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, contact us for support, or use our products. This may include your name, email address, phone number, and payment information. We also collect information automatically when you use our services, including log data, device information, and location information.
Privacy.section2_content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services; to process transactions; to send you technical notices and support messages; to communicate with you about products, services, and events; and to protect our services and users.
Privacy.section3_content: We do not share your personal information with third parties except in limited circumstances, such as when you consent to the sharing, when it's necessary to complete a transaction or provide a service you've requested, or when required by law.
Privacy.section4_content: You can access, update, or delete your account information at any time through your account settings. You can also opt out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the instructions in those communications.
Privacy.section5_content: We take reasonable measures to help protect your personal information from loss, theft, misuse, unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. However, no security system is impenetrable, and we cannot guarantee the security of our systems.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about pre-orders, shipping, and exclusive perks.

shipping.question: When will my pre-order ship?
shipping.answer: All pre-orders will ship in the order they were placed. The first batch is expected to ship in mid-August 2025. You will receive an email notification once your order ships.

shipping.question: Will I receive tracking information?
shipping.answer: Yes, once your order ships, we will send you an email with tracking information so you can monitor your package's progress.

refund.question: Can I get a refund for my pre-order?
refund.answer: You can request a full refund within 7 days of payment if the product hasn't shipped yet. Once shipped, refunds are not accepted.

refund.question: Can I change my shipping address?
refund.answer: Yes, you can modify your shipping address free of charge before the product ships. Please contact us as soon as possible to make changes.

perks.question: What exclusive gifts do pre-order customers receive?
perks.answer:
• Limited edition numbered card
• Brand thank you letter
• Scarf or small bag accessory

perks.question: Do I get warranty coverage?
perks.answer: Rolitt products come with a one-year warranty. Any non-human damage can be replaced or repaired free of charge.
